sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import '../styles/tour-details.css' import { Container,Row,Col,Form,ListGroup } from 'reactstrap'; import {useParams} from 'react-router-dom' import tourData from '../assets/data/tours' const TourDetails = () => { const { id } = useParams(); const tour = tourData.find(tour => tour.id === id); //destructure properties from tour object const { title, city, distance, price, maxGroupSize, desc, photo, reviews, avgRating } = tour; return ( <>

{title}

{city}

{distance} km

${price}

{maxGroupSize} people

{desc}

{reviews.map((review, index) => ( {review.name} - {review.rating} stars

{review.comment}

 ))}
Average Rating: {avgRating} stars
) }; export default TourDetails;
